item.title: üéì Appointed as Associate Editor of IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and Measurement
item.description:
Appointed as Associate Editor of IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and Measurement üìò

I am honored to share that I have been appointed as an Associate Editor (AE) of IEEE Transactions on Instrumentation and Measurement (IEEE TIM), following an invitation based on my recognized contributions to the journal as both an author and reviewer.

IEEE TIM is widely regarded as the leading journal in Instrumentation and Measurement, ranked No. 1 in General I&M by Impact Factor and positioned in Q1 of both the Instruments & Instrumentation and Electrical & Electronic Engineering categories of the Journal Citation Reports (JCR). Serving on its editorial board is both a privilege and a responsibility that I value greatly.

Editorial Role and Responsibilities ‚úçÔ∏è

As an Associate Editor, I will contribute to the peer-review and editorial decision-making process, supporting the journal‚Äôs mission to publish high-quality, rigorous, and impactful research across the full spectrum of instrumentation and measurement science.

This role enables close engagement with emerging research directions while upholding the highest standards of scholarly integrity and review quality.
